programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte

programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta

programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo

programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara

programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar

programme.desc: Naruto: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus
programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus

programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez

programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!

programme.sub-title: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara

programme.sub-title: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam

programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha!

programme.sub-title: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?

programme.desc: Naruto: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto
programme.sub-title: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna

programme.sub-title: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode

programme.sub-title: A Fora Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido

programme.title: Sentinela, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente do servio secreto acusado de homicdio precisa limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Red Stone: Caada Mortal, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Um adolescente testemunha o assassinato de seu irmo mais velho nas mos de um senhor do crime local. Quando ele encontra uma pedra valiosa que seu irmo havia escondido, ele percebe que um preo logo estar em sua cabea.

programme.title: O Golpe, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A histria de como um grupo de pequenos criminosos tentou dar o maior golpe na histria dos Estados Unidos em 1975: roubar milhes de um banco no menor estado da federao, Rhode Island.

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Redeno, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A prova chega etapa final, com o incio dos confrontos de Sarada contra Araya, da Aldeia da Areia, e Mitsuki contra Shinki, tambm da Areia!
programme.sub-title: Aldeia da folha vs Aldeia da areia

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A batalha final do torneio comea com Boruto, Sarada e Shinki participando de uma disputa no estilo mata-mata.
programme.sub-title: O Usurio da Aldeia de Ferro: Shinki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Momoshiki, Kinshiki e Urashiki, todos do Cl Otsutsuki, aparecem de repente na arena lotada de espectadores, e Boruto v de perto a extenso do poder de combate do pai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto percebe o tamanho do amor de seu pai pela aldeia e as pessoas, o que tambm acaba sendo sua fraqueza.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sasuke e os Kages travam uma batalha intensa contra Momoshiki e Kinshiki do Cl Otsutsuki que so ridiculamente poderosos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Boruto assistindo tudo atentamente, Naruto e Sasuke iniciam uma batalha contra o poderoso Momoshiki!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto j pediu desculpas a todos pelos erros cometidos durante a prova, mas continua preocupado com a profecia de Momoshiki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os famosos atores Tomaru e Ashina recebem ameaas de morte de uma pessoa desconhecida. Agora cabe s Equipes 7 e 10 os protegerem em uma misso em conjunto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O flerte de Tomaru deixa Cho-Cho nas nuvens, o que faz Sarada e os outros se perguntarem se a apaixonada Cho-Cho no perdeu o foco na misso!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O ninja com mscara de gs aparece novamente durante as filmagens e sequestra Tomaru.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Rock Lee, pai de Metal, anuncia que ele ensinar a Metal a tcnica suprema de taijutsu, Os Oito Portais Internos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos conseguem superar Kokuyou e finalmente alcanam Mitsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em vez de voltar para casa com Boruto, Mitsuki fica com Kokuyou.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto est ferido, inconsciente e no pode mais continuar. Todos pensam em voltar para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinados a encontrar Ohnoki, a equipe se infiltra na aldeia sem saber que est sendo observada.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: No meio do caminho para o ponto de encontro, Boruto e Ohnoki se deparam com o Campo de Treinamento da Aldeia da Pedra.
programme.sub-title: Os pensamentos de Ohnoki e de Kou

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Para conseguir sair da barreira, Boruto busca desesperadamente pelo corao de pedra, mas no o encontra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Ohnoki leva Boruto a um lugar especial para explicar sua opinio sobre do futuro, opinio essa formada aps a perda de Kozuchi, seu neto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kakou usa um Estilo Partcula raro e poderoso, levando Boruto ao limite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada so pegos e levados de volta para a base da Aldeia da Pedra junto com Ohnoki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kirara aparece e transforma Boruto e Sarada em "fantoches". Em seguida, ela ordena que os dois se matem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Surpreso e confuso com as aes de Mitsuki, Sekiei o ataca de forma imprudente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Ku aparece novamente para provocar e atacar Boruto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Imprio Proibido, (2015, Action)

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)

programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino mdio no Japo que uma estudante de karat arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarada de lutadores.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: The Killing, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: With fascinating detail, Stanley Kubrick lays bare the intricate inner-planning of a racetrack heist by a deadly mastermind (Sterling Hayden) and his crew. Co-stars Coleen Gray.

programme.title: Paths Of Glory, (1957, War)
programme.desc: This powerful, fact-based absurdity-of-war film stars Kirk Douglas as a commanding officer who defends three scapegoats on trial for a failed offensive that occurred within the French Army in 1916.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Crime)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: South Pacific, (1958, Musical)
programme.desc: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: Battle of Britain, (1969, War)
programme.desc: A stellar cast, including Michael Caine, Laurence Olivier and Christopher Plummer highlights this epic telling of the greatest air battle in history, when the outnumbered Royal Air Force defeated the German Luftwaffe, saving England from invasion.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.desc: Zach is devastated by the unexpected death of his girlfriend, Beth (Aubrey Plaza) until she miraculously comes back to life. However, the newly returned Beth isnt quite how he remembered and before long, Zachs whole world takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware theyre filming their own descent into horrornever meant to return.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Murphys on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers whos been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A wealthy woman hires a carpenter to work on her yacht. When the carpenter is left unpaid, Joanna, sets sail. The following day, Joanna's fished out of the sea after falling overboard and diagnosed with amnesia.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Clue, (1985, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Meet all the notorious suspects and discover all their foul play things. You'll love their dastardly doings as the bodies and the laughs pile up before your eyes. Featuring all three surprise endings!!

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Murphys on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers whos been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, (1989, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Screwball)

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this edge of your seat thriller,* John Travolta stars as Frank Morrison, a man who discovers that his sons new stepfather (Vince Vaughn) is not who he pretends to be.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy's hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!

programme.title: Law's attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo's power has depths which he and Luffy haven't bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Trebol's wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!

programme.title: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren't working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything upon Myself!

programme.title: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy's Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry's powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitoras Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.

programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.

programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Tyson rapidamente perde sua batalha com Kai. Andrew e Kenny informam que os Blade Sharks esto procurando o melhor Bit Beast que ningum pode vencer. Andrew, Kenny e Tyson reconstroem o Bey de Tyson.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E2

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E3

programme.title: O torneio regional de qualificao da Beyblade comea quando Tyson, Max e at Kenny entram para ver se conseguem destronar Kai, o atual campeo. Max ganha seu bloco e avana para a final.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E5

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E7

programme.title: Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E8

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E10

programme.title: Com Kenny trabalhando a noite toda antes do dia do torneio, Kevin, do White Tigers, tenta esgueirar-se para onde esto dormindo, roubar e / ou destruir o Driger de Ray.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E11

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E12

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E19

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E20
